text: Hagi vahe'mofo mofavre Izikieliga amanage hunka kasnampa kea huo, Amoni vahe'mo'zama Israeli vahe'ma kema zamasu'za zamazeri havizama nehaza vahera Mikozama Kegavama Hu'nea Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hie hunka zamasamio, bainati kazine, bainati kazimo'a vahe ahenaku anoreno masave frentegeno kopsinamo rumarave marave nehiaza nehie.
